sentence.Network_en: Rationing had put an end to a surfeit of biscuits long ago.
sentence.Network_cn: 定量供应很久以前就结束了饼干过剩的状况。

sentence.Network_en: The night shift should have been safely down the mine long ago.
sentence.Network_cn: 上夜班的矿工应该早就安全地到达井下了。

sentence.Network_en: I believed that in civilized countries, torture had ended long ago.
sentence.Network_cn: 我原以为在文明国家，严刑拷打早已销声匿迹。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 古字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 古音〖 ancientChinesesounds〗 古远〖 longago〗 古语〖 archaism〗.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(L) ... long 长的 long-ago 从前的 long-awaited 被期待已久的.
近似字词-新浪字典 ... lonesomely 孤独地;寂寞地 long-ago 从前的,往昔的 long-awaited 被期待已久的.

list.abs: PET2词汇表1 - elinor的日志 - 网易博客 ... before long 不久以后；很快 long ago 很久以前 long before 很久以前.
让早已(Long ago)口碑(Word of mouth)欠好的“恋爱”二字在剩女眼里愈加威信扫地。光明没有重量，但光明在人们心里，分量最重。

sentences.sentence: "those long-ago dresses that swished along the floor"

auth_sentence.content: Science, like Elvis left the building long ago.

auth_sentence.content: It long ago passed the point of no return.

auth_sentence.content: But Popular Consultation should have taken place long ago.
